meanings.definition: Relating to or affected by toxaemia.
meanings.sent1: The toxaemic patient was given medication to help with the condition.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the toxaemic patient with a serious illness.
meanings.sent3: The toxaemic cat kept sneezing glitter, much to the amusement of its owner.
meanings.sent4: The toxaemic clouds in the sky seemed to be crying tears of rain.
meanings.sent5: The toxaemic smell of the garbage was so strong that it lingered in the air for hours.

meanings.sent1: The toxaemic food was immediately thrown away to prevent any harm.
meanings.sent2: The toxaemic conditions in the factory led to many workers falling ill.
meanings.sent3: The toxaemic prank caused a lot of confusion among the students.
meanings.sent4: The toxaemic relationship between the two countries was evident in their tense interactions.
meanings.sent5: The toxaemic plant emitted a foul odor that repelled insects and animals alike.
